mng: to add, plus, (used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned), to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb), to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

exm.mng: to add, plus, (used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned), to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb), to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to become a member, to join, to mix into, to participate in, to add in
to participate, to take part, to join
to add something extra, an additional increment, addendum, to append, an additional posthumous title
plus, to put in, to add, to add on, to add into, in addition, on top of that
to reinforce, to strengthen, to increase
to become a member of an alliance or union, to align, to join, participate
to add oil, to top up with gas, to refuel, to accelerate, abbr. for 加大油門|加大油门[jia1 da4 you2 men2], to step on the gas, fig. to make an extra effort, fig. to cheer sb on

in addition, moreover, (used before a disyllabic verb to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned), to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb), to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
